duties_responsibilities.duty: Conduct in-home consultations with homeowners, providing estimates, sales solutions, and custom design options for their replacement projects.
Build rapport with customers through a superior homeowner experience while displaying drive and motivation for top results.
Work with pre-set and pre-qualified leads to fuel dynamic growth through a customer-focused, consultative selling experience.
Participate in 12 weeks of paid training to ensure success and receive coaching from sales managers to build the skills and confidence needed to get results.
Exceed homeowners' expectations and deliver delight to make a positive impact on both their homes and lives.

education_certification.credential: High school diploma or equivalent; college degree preferred
